title: Other World Assassin Life of a Man who was a Shut-in - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Assassins   Cheats   Fantasy World   Game Elements   Level System   Loli   Magic   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   R-15   Special Abilities   Transported to Another World
author: 服部正蔵
description:
A man with 7 years experience as a shut-in is in another world!

The abundantly talented Satou Yuuma dies suddenly, the God who thought it to be wasteful transfers him to another world.

Armed with a growth cheat from God, as well as the mysterious Sign Isolation skill.

A seemingly simple skill which in fact is hiding unthinkable capability…>
